name: Blue Mountains
description:
Summary

The story is set between the conversations these two girls have with each other and the feelings that grow within them as Lea the protagonist tries to work through her trauma and remember the promise they made years ago.

You play as Lea a traumatized 17 year old girl who gets lost in the woods when she stumbles upon a strange structure atop a hill. The structure seems ordinary enough, old, covered in vines but a strange feeling finds itself gathering within Lea. Upon on what seems to be an altar, a red crystal lies, shining brightly. As Lea picks up the crystal and a bright light blinds her sight, the circle structure now shows a very different landscape, and the strangest thing of all, another girl lit by a setting sun.

Download and play the game at the bottom of this page!

Features
  • Interact and make dialouge choices.
  • Walk around in a stylized environment.
  • Confront trauma
  • 2 endings
  • 25-30 minutes play-through time.
System Requirements

Minimum system requirements

OS: Windows 8 or 10
CPU: Intel Core i5-8300H @ 2.30 GHZ or equivalent.
GPU:  NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or equivalent.
Available disk storage space: 500MB
RAM: 4GB
Monitor resolution: 1920x1080

We do not recommend running this game on a computer that doesn't reach the minimum requirements.

Team

A student team of 6 people, consisting of 4 designers/programmers and 2 artists. This game was made in a school project course, spanning 10 weeks of development time.
